name: Burger Chef. Baby and Toddler Kitchen Game
name_original: Burger Chef. Baby and Toddler Kitchen Game
description:
Are you passionate about cooking? Take charge of the kitchen. In this game you don’t need to grow your cooking skills form the very beginning because you’re already the master chef beyond compare!It’s lunch time! Hungry?

Grab your apron – let’s make yummy burgers! Cook after your favorite recipes or try absolutely new ones. Drag items from the fridge to make your perfect dish. In this kitchen food never runs out, all ingredients are fresh and delivered right from the farmer market so that you could have the perfect setup for preparing delightful dishes! Select your favorite burger ban or sandwich bread, add vegetables and meat. And don’t forget to decorate your masterpiece with a special sauce. Now take a fork and get ready to treat yourself to the tastiest sandwich ever!

Unleash your imagination! This game turns ordinary cooking into a really fun activity! Stack layer upon layer and build a huge sandwich! Have fun with kitchen games for kids free - experiment with yummy ingredients. Make a veggie sandwich or an insane burger with super extra meat!

What will you find inside Baby Kitchen cooking?
• Unlimited open-ended game play. Cook delicious food without any pressure. There're no inpatient or disappointed clients in these fast food cooking games;
• Use lots of different ingredients. Dozens of possible combinations for making your very own burgers and sandwiches;
• Tap on the prepared burger to eat it all by yourself!
• Master your cooking talent with kids cooking games for age 2 and 3. Make your creativity work;
• Stunning decorations to make your dishes look really outstanding;
• Sandwich shop is fun for kids of all ages and adults as well!

Warning! Don’t play the game on empty stomach since the treats in the app look sooooo mouthwatering! Yummy!

Are you hungry for more chef cooking games? Check out other themes in the series of kids cooking kitchen chef!
